001
002package com.commercetools.http.netty;
003
004import java.util.Objects;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
007import java.util.function.BiFunction;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010
011import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
012
013import io.netty.buffer.Unpooled;
014import io.netty.channel.ChannelOption;
015import io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpHeaderValues;
016import io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpMethod;
017import io.netty.resolver.DefaultAddressResolverGroup;
018import io.netty.util.AsciiString;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpHeaders;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
021import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
022import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.HttpClientBase;
023
024import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
025
026import reactor.core.publisher.Mono;
027import reactor.netty.ByteBufMono;
028import reactor.netty.NettyOutbound;
029import reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClient;
030import reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClientRequest;
031import reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClientResponse;
032import reactor.netty.resources.ConnectionProvider;
033
034public class CtNettyHttpClient extends HttpClientBase {
035
036    public static final int MAX_REQUESTS = 64;
037    private static final byte[] EMPTY_BYTES = new byte[0];
038
039    private final HttpClient nettyClient;
040
041    public CtNettyHttpClient() {
042        this(MAX_REQUESTS);
043    }
044
045    public CtNettyHttpClient(int maxConnections) {
046        super();
047        this.nettyClient = createDefaultClient(maxConnections);
048        this.nettyClient.warmup();
049    }
050
051    public CtNettyHttpClient(final BuilderOptions options) {
052        this(MAX_REQUESTS, options);
053    }
054
055    public CtNettyHttpClient(int maxConnections, final BuilderOptions options) {
056        super();
057        this.nettyClient = options.plus(createDefaultClient(maxConnections));
058        this.nettyClient.warmup();
059    }
060
061    public CtNettyHttpClient(final Supplier<HttpClient> httpClientSupplier) {
062        super();
063        this.nettyClient = httpClientSupplier.get();
064        this.nettyClient.warmup();
065    }
066
067    public CtNettyHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor) {
068        this(executor, MAX_REQUESTS);
069    }
070
071    public CtNettyHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxConnections) {
072        super(executor);
073        this.nettyClient = createDefaultClient(maxConnections);
074        this.nettyClient.warmup();
075    }
076
077    public CtNettyHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final BuilderOptions options) {
078        this(executor, MAX_REQUESTS, options);
079    }
080
081    public CtNettyHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final int maxConnections, final BuilderOptions options) {
082        super(executor);
083        this.nettyClient = options.plus(createDefaultClient(maxConnections));
084        this.nettyClient.warmup();
085    }
086
087    public CtNettyHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final Supplier<HttpClient> httpClientSupplier) {
088        super(executor);
089        this.nettyClient = httpClientSupplier.get();
090        this.nettyClient.warmup();
091    }
092
093    public static HttpClient createDefaultClient(final int maxConnections) {
094        return HttpClient.create(ConnectionProvider.create("commercetools", maxConnections))
095                .secure()
096                .compress(true)
097                .resolver(DefaultAddressResolverGroup.INSTANCE)
098                .option(ChannelOption.CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MILLIS, 10000);
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
103        final HttpMethod method = HttpMethod.valueOf(request.getMethod().name());
104        return nettyClient.request(method)
105                .uri(request.getUri())
106                .send(toNettyRequest(request))
107                .responseSingle(toApiResponse())
108                .toFuture()
109                .thenApplyAsync(Function.identity(), executor());
110    }
111
112    private static BiFunction<HttpClientRequest, NettyOutbound, Publisher<Void>> toNettyRequest(
113            final ApiHttpRequest httpRequest) {
114        return (nettyRequest, nettyOutbound) -> {
115            httpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders().forEach(stringStringEntry -> {
116                nettyRequest.addHeader(stringStringEntry.getKey(), stringStringEntry.getValue());
117            });
118
119            AsciiString mediaType = HttpHeaderValues.APPLICATION_JSON;
120            if (httpRequest.getHeaders()
121                    .getHeaders()
122                    .stream()
123                    .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE))) {
124                mediaType = AsciiString
125                        .of(Objects.requireNonNull(httpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE)));
126            }
127            nettyRequest.requestHeaders().set(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE, mediaType);
128
129            final byte[] body = httpRequest.getBody();
130            if (body != null) {
131                return nettyOutbound.send(Mono.just(Unpooled.wrappedBuffer(body)));
132            }
133            return nettyOutbound;
134        };
135    }
136
137    @NotNull
138    private static BiFunction<HttpClientResponse, ByteBufMono, Mono<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> toApiResponse() {
139        return (response, byteBufMono) -> byteBufMono.asByteArray().defaultIfEmpty(EMPTY_BYTES).map(bytes -> {
140            ApiHttpHeaders headers = new ApiHttpHeaders(response.responseHeaders().entries());
141            return new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.status().code(), headers, bytes.length > 0 ? bytes : null,
142                response.status().reasonPhrase());
143        });
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    protected void closeDelegate() throws Throwable {
148    }
149}
